name: Chimera Combat (rscp)
description:
Chimera Combat is an arcade-like horde survival game where players can create their very own playable creature.  

- Customize your monster with various limbs and bodies

- Survive against an ever-growing onslaught of enemies

- Strive for new personal bests in each attempt

Created by members of DATT2310 Lab 3: 

Victor Pan

Riordan Palmer

Strahinja Bastovanovic

Estella Pham

Lin Guan

Chunxin Zhang
